title: Refill Binance Smart Chain & Ethereum Pools with Anonymity/Liquidity Reward
body:
# Background

Cyclone is the leading #PriFi protocol that offers cross-chain + zkSNARKs-based privacy, with yield enhancement, governed by the decentralized DAO. Cyclone has been successfully launched on IoTeX, BSC, Ethereum, and Polygon and its TVL has reached 15,000,000 USD.

# Proposal

The proposal suggests refilling the following pools that are about to finish their second 90 days of the mission, yet still very active in terms of TVL. Once passed, additional CYC will be minted and injected into these pools on 9/23 0:00AM UTC to support them operate for another 90 days with the proposed amount of anonymity/liquidity reward.

## BSC - Pool C3PO

Asset: 100 BNB

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 3 CYC per day

## BSC - Pool R2D2

Asset: 10,000 BUSD

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 1 CYC per day

## BSC - Pool BB8

Asset: 25,000 IOTX

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.5 CYC per day

## BSC - Pool Jonny5

Asset: 3 CYC

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 2 CYC per day

## ETH - Pool Latte

Asset: 100 ETH

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 3 CYC per day

## ETH - Pool Espresso

Asset: 100,000 USDT

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 3 CYC per day

## ETH - Pool Cold Brew

Asset: 100 TORN

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.15 CYC per day

## CYC-BSC Liquidity Pool

Asset: CYC-BNB LP

Life Cycle: 90 days

Liquidity Mining: 20 CYC per day

## CYC-ETH Liquidity Pool

Asset: CYC-ETH LP

Life Cycle: 90 days

Liquidity Mining: 20 CYC per day

# The Vote

This proposal needs to be approved via a vote by the community before execution.

# Discussion

Please discuss this proposal in this forum thread - https://forum.cyclone.xyz/t/refill-binance-smart-chain-ethereum-pools-with-anonymity-liquidity-reward/148
author: 0x4891f20A4C681DE9aB75AF9523e2f070A26f9a20
